snippet: Parliament approved a new government on Thursday whose leader promised to keep the austerity measures the country imposed but also to raise public-sector salaries as soon as he can.
abstract: Romanian Parliament approves a new government that will be led by Mihai Razvan Ungureanu, a former spy chief who promised to keep the austerity measures the country imposed to win international loans but also to raise public-sector salaries.
lead_paragraph: Parliament approved a new government on Thursday whose leader promised to keep the austerity measures the country imposed but also to raise public-sector salaries as soon as he can.
